thread.title: Cubs make it to NLCS for 1st time in 12 years
thread.title_full: Cubs make it to NLCS for 1st time in 12 years

author: JAY COHEN
title: Cubs make it to NLCS for 1st time in 12 years
text:
Paul Beaty Cubs make it to NLCS for 1st time in 12 years 
Fans gather on the streets outside of Wrigley Field after the Cubs won 6-4 in Game 4 in baseball's National League Division Series against the St. Louis Cardinals, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Paul Beaty) Nam Y. Huh Cubs make it to NLCS for 1st time in 12 years 
Chicago Cubs left fielder Kyle Schwarber gives high-fives to fans after the Cubs won 6-4 in Game 4 in baseball's National League Division Series against the St. Louis Cardinals, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh) Nam Y. Huh Cubs make it to NLCS for 1st time in 12 years 
Chicago Cubs center fielder Dexter Fowler (24) claps hands and smoke cigar after the Cubs won 6-4 in Game 4 in baseball's National League Division Series against the St. Louis Cardinals, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh) Nam Y. Huh Cubs make it to NLCS for 1st time in 12 years 
Chicago Cubs starting pitcher Jake Arrieta poses for selfie after the Cubs won 6-4 in Game 4 in baseball's National League Division Series against the St. Louis Cardinals, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh) Paul Beaty Cubs make it to NLCS for 1st time in 12 years 
Chicago Cubs' Kris Bryant and Anthony Rizzo celebrate after winning Game 4 in baseball's National League Division Series, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Chicago. The Cubs won 6-4. (AP Photo/Paul Beaty) Posted: Tuesday, October 13, 2015 11:25 pm | Updated: 3:00 am, Wed Oct 14, 2015. Cubs make it to NLCS for 1st time in 12 years Associated Press | 
CHICAGO (AP) — When it was over, Anthony Rizzo jumped around Wrigley Field and hugged everyone in sight. The moment was in his grasp, and he was determined to hold onto it for as long as possible. 
The All-Star slugger endured several seasons of losing with the Chicago Cubs before they finally got into the playoffs again, and he was more than ready to enjoy the franchise's first appearance in the NL Championship Series in more than a decade.
